title: Schema for a Category Version
description: Each version provides data about an actual version of the category at a particular point in time. Version can be used to notify users about any changes or updates. One category may have many versions.

id.title: Version ID
id.description: An identifier for this particular version of information

date.title: Release Date
date.description: The date this version was released, or published.

id.title: Category ID
id.description: ID for this category sepcified as a code of a relevant CPV class common for all the items under this category

items.title: Category items
items.description: List of the types of goods available under this category

criteria.title: Decision making tree
criteria.description: Criteria describe the sequence of related questions, where answers are needed to reflect the specific needs that the Procuring Entity intends to purchase. Array according to [ocds_requirements_extension](https://github.com/open-contracting-extensions/ocds_requirements_extension)

conversions.title: Conversions
conversions.description: Conversions needed to run a calculation of available valiants once Procuring Entities' need is captured. Array according to [eOCDS-conversions](https://github.com/eOCDS-Extensions/eOCDS-conversions)

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: Classification should be drawn from an existing scheme or list of codes. This field is used to indicate the scheme/codelist from which the classification is drawn.

id.title: ID
id.description: The classification code drawn from the selected scheme.

description.title: Description
description.description: A textual description or title for the code.

uri.title: URI
uri.description: A URI to identify the code. In the event individual URIs are not available for items in the identifier scheme this value should be left blank.

Coefficient.title: Coefficient
Coefficient.description: A coefficient applied in case of the value of prescribed attribute matches

minValue.title: Inducative minimum requirement value
minValue.description: Indicative minimum value of related 'requirement' received through 'requirementResponse'

maxValue.title: Indicative maximum value
maxValue.description: Indicative maximum value of related 'requirement' received through 'requirementResponse'

period.title: Period
period.description: Used to specify a particular period the conversion and its coefficients are applies to

coefficient.title: Coefficient
coefficient.description: Precise value that has to be applied for conversion in specific case

Conversion.title: Conversion
Conversion.description: Conversion is used to describe conversions and its coefficients applicable for specific value received for requirement or observation

relatesTo.title: Related schema element
relatesTo.description: The schema element that the conversion applies. For example, the conversion may be defined against a requirement or against a metric.

relatedItem.title: Related item
relatedItem.description: Where 'relatesTo' is not empty this field must be populated with the id of the item in this tender section which the conversion relates to.

rationale.title: Conversion rationale
rationale.description: The free-text rationale of using of this conversion

description.title: Conversion Details
description.description: Free text description of this conversion could be shared here

coefficients.title: Coefficients
coefficients.description: A list of any applicable coefficient for this conversion

Criterion.title: Criterion
Criterion.description: A criterion on which either bidders or items will be judged, evaluated or assessed.

relatesTo.description: The schema element that the criterion judges, evaluates or assesses. For example criterion may be defined against items or against bidders.

relatedItem.description: Where relatesTo = "item" this field must be populated with the id of the item in this tender section which the criterion relates to. Where relatesTo <> "item" this field should be omitted

requirementGroups.title: Requirement groups
requirementGroups.description: A list of requirementGroup for this Criterion. A criterion is satisfied by one or more requirement groups being met. A requirement group is met when all requirements in the group are satisfied.

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Specific type of good available under this category

id.title: ID
id.description: A local identifier to reference and merge the items by. Must be unique within a given array of items.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this specific type of good

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: The primary classification for the item

additionalClassifications.title: Additional classifications
additionalClassifications.description: An array of additional classification for the item. This may also be used to present codes from an internal classification scheme.

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: The start date for the period

endDate.title: End date
endDate.description: The end date for the period

maxExtentDate.title: Maximum extent
maxExtentDate.description: The period cannot be extended beyond this date.

durationInDays.title: Duration (days)
durationInDays.description: The maximum duration of this period in days. Where a start and end date are given, this field is optional, and should reflect the difference between those two days.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the period reflected in ISO format

Requirement.title: Requirement
Requirement.description: An atomic requirement. Requirements can specify the expected value that the response has to contain, or a range of threshold values within which the response has to fit in. The requirement may apply to a certain period of time

expectedValue.title: Exected value
expectedValue.description: Used to state the requirement when the response must be particular value

minValue.title: Min value
minValue.description: Used to state the lower bound of the requirement when the response must be within a certain range

maxValue.title: Max value
maxValue.description: Used to state the upper bound of the requirement when the response must be within a certain range

period.title: Period
period.description: Used to specify a particular [Period] the requirement applies to, for example the bidder's turnover in a given year

optionDetails.title: Option Details
optionDetails.description: Where options are applied 'Option Details'is used to capture this information

optionGroups.title: Option groups
optionGroups.description: A list of option groups for this element

optionsToCombine.title: Options to combine
optionsToCombine.description: Whethe buyer reserves the right to combine options a 'Option to combine' is used to capture this information

OptionGroup.title: Option Group
OptionGroup.description: An option group is a set of optionss that may be applied by Procuring Entity for specific property

relatesTo.title: Related scheme element
relatesTo.description: The scheme element that the group applies

OptionToCombine.title: Option to combine
OptionToCombine.description: Whethe buyer reserves the right to combine options a 'Option to combine' is used to capture this information

relatedOptions.title: Related options
relatedOptions.description: A number of options related to this OptionToCombine

RequirementGroup.title: Requirement group
RequirementGroup.description: A requirement group is a set of requirements that must be fulfilled together to validate a criterion.

id.description: The identifier for this requirement group

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: A list of any [Requirement] which must all be satisified for the requirement group to be met.
